name: Star Catcher Demo
description:
Star Catcher - It's a story about middle age wizzard, schizophrenic Tallanar, which was asked to find a thief who steals magic and alchemic items, strictly specific items to create ultimate sorcecer. During adventure you meet several characters and aqquire them to the team, such as pyromancer, cryomancer, warrior, shaman*, cleric and others. Playable demo provides approx 30min - 1h of gameplay where you can check already made systems and oncoming features. This demo contains:

-720p resolution

- Autosave every 3 minutes.

- Gamepad support

- Optimized RPG Maker MV engine

- Khas Lightning effects

- PIXI.js special effects

- Fully upgradeable weapons **

- Improved skill learn system and skill damage (check in battle how they works)

- Modified Critical Hit system (Critical damage value raises with hero's level)

- Modified TP values (Max limit raises with hero's level)

- 30 Save Game Slots (Slot #30 is reserved for checkpoints and Autosaves)

* - Shaman is not available in demo

** - full version will allow to upgrade any element of equpiment.

Following issues that where not yet fixed:

- Wrong item/weapon descriptions or empty fields

- Some UI elements are without the sound

- Shitty Logo bitmap

- Shitty HP Bar in Battle with bosses and demi-Bossess.

- No Bitmap in shop window :(
